title: Return from the road
brief_description: Short film starring US comedian Harvey Korman as a travelling salesman just returned from a long sales trip, tired, hungry and frustrated. With an unco-operative wife who won’t cook and then makes him sleep on the couch, he dreams of what might have been. News of the imminent arrival of his mother-in-law turns his thoughts to the road again.
